notes: Luxurious, high-end modern apartment on the 9th floor with designer furniture, recessed LED lighting, marble-textured TV feature wall, and light wood flooring throughout. Excellent natural light with large floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking greenery and city views. The glass coffee table with sharp edges and the arc floor lamp could be baby hazards, but no open balcony is visible â€” windows appear to be fixed panels, which is safer for a child. The building is clearly a modern high-rise in Da'an district and almost certainly has an elevator. Very clean and move-in ready condition with tasteful decor.
